name: AWS IoT Things
short: A service in AWS that allows you to connect and manage devices, and collect, process, analyze, and act on device data.
description: AWS IoT Things is a service within AWS's IoT platform that lets you register and manage 'things' or devices. Each 'thing' is a device (e.g., sensor, light bulb) that connects to AWS IoT. It has a unique identity and can securely interact with AWS IoT services and other devices. You can assign attributes to things, group them, and manage access policies. It provides a Device Shadow service to store and retrieve the current state of each thing, enabling apps to interact with devices even when they're offline.
